Secretary-T reasurer
B. B. Brackett, KUSD
University of South Dakota
Vermillion, South Dakota
July 8, 1956
Executive Secretary
H. A. Engel, WHA
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Executive Committee
C. A. Taylor, WESG
R. C. Higgy, WOSU
E. P. Humbert, WTAW
M. C. Jensen, WCAL
F. F. Nalder, KWSC
Carl Menzer, WSUI
Mi*. B. B. Brackett
Radio Station KUSD
Univ. of S. Dak.
Vermillion, S. D.
Dear Mr. Brackett:
Here is an outline of the tentative
plan for our convention. Will you look it over,
make any changes or additions you may think
advisable, and then return it to me?
Hone of these people have been approached
on the matter of taking part in the program, and
it is likely that some may not be available. We
will welcome your further suggestions on program
units.
Very truly yours^p
Executive Secretary
